snippet: Responding to a report in The New York Post, CNN said it would be adding weekend programs that are similar to a documentary-style travel show hosted by Anthony Bourdain that it will begin showing next year.
abstract: Responding to a report in The New York Post, CNN said it would be adding weekend programs that are similar to a documentary-style travel show hosted by Anthony Bourdain that it will begin showing next year.

headline.main: CNN to Promote Nonfiction TV, not Reality TV, Network Says
